title: AIS measurement value
description: The value of a certain type of AIS measurement

entity_id.description: The mmsi identifier (ais entity )this value is related to

message_type.description: the message type of the given AIS measurement

requested_message_type.description: the requested message type used in message type 15 (interrogation); Can request up to two message types from two stations

repeat_indicator.description: The amount of times the message has been repeated (3 is do not repeat anymore)

callsign.description: The call sign of the given AIS entity, '@@@@@@@' is default

entity_name.description: The name of the AIS entity

entity_type.description: The type of vessel given by the AIS, default is 0 ('Not available (default)')

timestamp.description: UTC timestamp in seconds of the ais message

SOG.description: The Speed over ground of the ship

ROT.description: The Rate Of Turn of the ship in degrees, minus = turning left; plus = turning right; (128  no turn information available (default))

RAIM_flag.description: Receiver autonomous integrity monitoring (RAIM) flag of electronic position fixing device

position_accuracy.description: The accuracy of the given position

IMO_number.description: The International Maritime Organization (IMO) number is a unique identifier for ships

maximum_draught.description: Maximum present static draught in meters

altitude.description: Altitude (derived from GNSS or barometric (see altitude sensor parameter below)) (m) (0-4 094 m) 4 095 = not available

destination.description: Destination of the vessel, Maximum 20 characters

special_maneuvre_indicator.description: Indicates whether an special maneuver is ongoing

COG.description: The course over ground (COG) of the vessel 0-3599

control_long_range_message.description: Transmission control for long-range broadcast message

altitude_sensor.description: The type of altitude sensore used on the ship

assigned_mode_flag.description: State of station if it is operating in autonomous or assigned mode

destination_id.description: The MMSI number where the ship is sending data to.

multiple_destination_id.description: The MMSI numbers where the ship is sending data to.

safety_related_text.description: The addressed safety related message send by the ship

DGNSS_data.description: The DGNSS data object send in the AIS message type 17

aid_navigation_extension.description: Name of the Aid to navigation extension
